title: Who Won the Draft, Biggest Steal, Best Fit, and More Draft Superlatives | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Draft expert Danny Kelly and Mallory Rubin join Kevin in doling out superlatives for the 2020 NFL draft, including best draft, worst draft, steal of the draft, most shocking slide, weirdest Skype presence, and more.
Host: Kevin Clark
Guest: Danny Kelly and Mallory Rubin

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
